sentences.en: A digital aircraft anti - skid braking controller based on embedded DSP - TMS 320 LF 2407 was introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种基于嵌入式DSP芯片TMS320LF2407的数字化飞机防滑刹车控制器.

sentences.en: After his divorce, Mike bearrived a drunk down on skid row.
sentences.cn: 离婚之后, 迈克尔沦落为贫民街的酒鬼.

sentences.en: Bank - To - Turn ( BTT ) and Skid - To - Turn ( STT ) control techniques are widely used in current missile control systems.
sentences.cn: 现代导弹控制技术一般可分为侧滑转弯 ( Skid-to-Turn,STT ) 控制技术和倾斜转弯 ( Bank-to-Tum,BTT ) 控制技术.

sentences.en: He became a skid row type of drunkard.
sentences.cn: 他变成了那种贫民区里常见的醉鬼。

sentences.en: He braked suddenly, causing the front wheels to skid.
sentences.cn: 他猛然刹车，使得前车轮打滑了。

sentences.en: He braked suddenly, causing the front wheels to skid.
sentences.cn: 他突然剎车, 使得前轮打了滑.

sentences.en: He slammed on the brakes and we went into a long skid (= started to skid ) .
sentences.cn: 他猛力踩下车，我们的车子打滑了很长一段路。

sentences.en: Hot water Fill - The skid is filled with water from the CIP tank.
sentences.cn: 热的水填充 - 橇被装满来自CIP箱的水.

sentences.en: I slammed the brakes on and went into a skid.
sentences.cn: 我猛地一踩刹车，结果车子打滑了。

sentences.en: Many highly trained workers ended up on skid row during the recession.
sentences.cn: 很多受过良好训练的工人在经济萧条时都流落到贫民窟.

sentences.en: The brakes locked , causing the car to skid.
sentences.cn: 汽车因车轮刹住而打滑.

sentences.en: The car has many safety features, including anti - skid braking.
sentences.cn: 这车配有许多特别安全装置, 包括防滑制动器.

sentences.en: The car went into a skid.
The lorry went into a skid and crashed into the barrier.
sentences.cn: 卡车失控打滑撞到障碍物上.

sentences.en: The police examined the skid marks to see how fast the car had been travelling.
sentences.cn: 警察检查了车轮滑行痕迹,以判断汽车当时开得有多快.

sentences.en: Turn the car towards the skid if you lose control of it.
sentences.cn: 如果汽车失去控制，就往打滑的方向转。
